title: Sweetcorn Kedgeree with Chilli and Coriander
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '200g basmati rice', '1/2 tsp turmeric', '600ml boiling water', '1 lemon', '150g frozen sweetcorn', '150g frozen peas', '400g skinless undyed smoked haddock fillet, cut into 2.5cm chunks', '40g butter, cut into small pieces', '1 fresh green chilli, seeded and cut into rings', '30g fresh coriander, leaves coarsely chopped']
